title: 搭建跨服
txt_content:
我搭建跨服遇到了难题第一 安装mysql  这个很麻烦 一不知道怎么安装二不知道是两个服务端都要安还是只安一个  还有配置  
是光用端口吗?   不用内网IP?
groups:
  md_5:
  - admin
disabled_commands:
- find
player_limit: -1
stats: 3c48a88a-2c83-47bc-8d60-bd22a047eec9
permissions:
  default:
  - bungeecord.command.server
  - bungeecord.command.list
  admin:
  - bungeecord.command.alert
  - bungeecord.command.end
  - bungeecord.command.ip
  - bungeecord.command.reload
listeners:
- fallback_server: MiLi
  max_players: 1
  host: 0.0.0.0:25577
  tab_size: 60
  force_default_server: false
  bind_local_address: true
  ping_passthrough: false
  tab_list: GLOBAL_PING
  motd: '&1Another Bungee server'
  default_server: MiLi
  forced_hosts:
    pvp.md-5.net: pvp
timeout: 30000
connection_throttle: 4000
servers:
  MiLi:
    address: localhost:25565
    restricted: false
    motd: '&1Just another BungeeCord - Forced Host'
online_mode: false
  Home:
    address: localhost:25565
    restricted: false
    motd: '&1Just another BungeeCord - Forced Host'
online_mode: false

以上是我跨服的配置

replies.author: TTAA
replies.txt_content:
你太牛逼了~~~
佩服佩服~
其实不用搭建MySQL，直接用就行了 跳过那步，相信我0.0
